participant_2.background:
I m writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

After finishing my career i discovered that i m not that pasionate about it.

content.text: I'm a big football fan. Do you like football?
I don't really watch football, but I like the idea of it. I think it's a great sport.
What do you like about it?
I like the teamwork involved. I also like the strategy behind it. It's a lot more than just running and catching the ball.
I agree. It's a very complex sport.
Yeah, it is. I'm not sure if I'll ever get into watching it, but I can definitely appreciate it.
What are you passionate about?
I'm passionate about writing. I'm writing my first novel right now.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I'm not sure if I have the patience for it.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun. I love the feeling of creating a world and characters that are all my own.
I can imagine. It must be really rewarding.
It is. I'm really excited to see how my novel turns out.
I'm sure it'll be great. You seem like you have a lot of talent.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a professional translator.
That's interesting. How did you get into that?
I started out as a foreign language teacher, but I eventually realized that I didn't really like teaching. I'm much more of a writer than a teacher.
I can see that. You seem to have a real passion for writing.
Thanks! I do. I'm so glad I found a job where I can use my writing skills.
I'm sure you're a great translator.
I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're doing a great job.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
